text: Aey logon jo iman laye ho, itaat karo Allah ki aur itaat karo Rasool ki aur un logon ki jo tum mein se sahib e amr hon, phir agar tumhare darmiyan kisi maamle mein nizaa (dispute/differ) ho jaye to usey Allah aur Rasool ki taraf pher do agar tum waqayi Allah aur roz e aakhir par iman rakhte ho. Yahi ek saheeh tareeqe kaar hai aur anjaam ke aitbaar se bhi behtar hai
